name.ja: 遊戯王デッキダウンローダ

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Yu-Gi-Oh decks from ocg.xpg.jp for Automatic Dueling System(遊戯王ADS) like YGOPro, YGOcore or DevPro.
short.ja: このアプリはocg.xpg.jpから遊戯王のデッキをダウンロードするのこどできます。ダウンロードしたフォーマットは遊戯王ADS（Automatic Dueling System）が使います、たどえばYGOPro、YGOcoreやDevPro
short.zh_CN: 快速下载ocg.xpg.jp上的任何游戏王牌组，提供YGOPro、YGOcore或DevPro等游戏王ADS软件使用
short.zh_TW: 快速下載ocg.xpg.jp上的任何遊戲王牌組，提供YGOPro、YGOcore或DevPro等遊戲王ADS軟體使用

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yu-Gi-Oh Deck Downloader

Usage
1. Go to https://ocg.xpg.jp/deck/deck.fcgi and enter the desired deck.
2. Press the extension button in the upper-left corner, or right-click on page then select "Download Deck".
3. Move the downloaded file(*.ydk) to "[Your ADS directory]/deck/"
4. You will then be able to see the deck you just downloaded in the ADS deck edit screen.

This is an open source project. Visit Yu-Gi-Oh-Deck-Downloader's Github page for full instructions, more information, bug reports, or to contribute.

https://github.com/Jasonnor/Yu-Gi-Oh-Deck-Downloader
long.ja:
Yu-Gi-Oh Deck Downloader

Usage
1. Go to https://ocg.xpg.jp/deck/deck.fcgi and enter the desired deck.
2. Press the extension button in the upper-left corner, or right-click on page then select "Download Deck".
3. Move the downloaded file to "[Your ADS directory]/deck/"
4. You will then be able to see the deck you just downloaded in the ADS deck edit screen.

This is an open source project. Visit Yu-Gi-Oh-Deck-Downloader's Github page for full instructions, more information, bug reports, or to contribute.

https://github.com/Jasonnor/Yu-Gi-Oh-Deck-Downloader
long.zh_CN:
Yu-Gi-Oh Deck Downloader

使用说明如下：
1. 前往 https://ocg.xpg.jp/deck/deck.fcgi
2. 点选想要下载的牌组进入（例如：https://ocg.xpg.jp/deck/deck.fcgi?ListNo=268211）
3. 点击浏览器右上角的「游戏王卡按钮」下载牌组，或者开启右键选单，然後点击「Download Deck」下载
4. 将下载的*.ydk档案移至「ADS目录/deck/」文件夹内
5. 开启YGOPro，就能看到刚才下载的牌组

此扩展为开放原始码专案，目前功能其实相当阳春简单，如果有任何建议或Bug欢迎提issues或发送PR，非常感谢！

https://github.com/Jasonnor/Yu-Gi-Oh-Deck-Downloader
long.zh_TW:
Yu-Gi-Oh Deck Downloader

使用說明如下：
1. 前往 https://ocg.xpg.jp/deck/deck.fcgi
2. 點選想要下載的牌組進入（例如：https://ocg.xpg.jp/deck/deck.fcgi?ListNo=268211）
3. 點擊瀏覽器右上角的「遊戲王卡按鈕」下載牌組，或者開啟右鍵選單，然後點擊「Download Deck」下載
4. 將下載的*.ydk檔案移至「ADS目錄/deck/」文件夾內
5. 開啟YGOPro，就能看到剛才下載的牌組

此插件為開放原始碼專案，目前功能其實相當陽春簡單，如果有任何建議或Bug歡迎提issues或發送PR，非常感謝！

https://github.com/Jasonnor/Yu-Gi-Oh-Deck-Downloader
